import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Leaderboard=()=>{const[results,setResults]=useState([]);const[category,setCategory]=useState("");const[categories,setCategories]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchCategories=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:4000/quiz/categories");console.log("Fetched categories:",response.data);// Debugging
